Welcome, and thank you for helping us test our landing page builder!

Use the builder to modify the existing page to look like the image below. To do this, you will need to complete the following tasks:

  • Change the background color of the header.
  • Add spacing to the top and bottom of the header.
  • Change the background color of the area containing the form.
  • Add spacing to the area containing the form.
  • Vertically center the form.
  • Remove the registration countdown section.
  • Always describe what you think should be happening as you explore and click the interface.

You can return to this modal at any time by clicking the ? button in the header. As you complete the task, please discuss any thoughts or concerns you may have. When you're finished, please answer the following questions:

Final product:

  • How did you feel as you were editing the page?
  • Did the editing process work as you expected?
  • Did you encounter any challenges that prevented you from completing the task at hand?

Thank you for your time and testing!
